sentences.en: An intriguing item on the news pages caused me to raise an eyebrow over my morning coffee.
sentences.cn: 早晨喝咖啡时，新闻版面的一则趣闻令我感到惊奇。

sentences.en: An intriguing variant to pipelines would be to carry the water using the existing system of canals.
sentences.cn: 除用管道外，利用现有的运河系统来输送水也很值得一试。

sentences.en: It is an intriguing problem for the snow technician.
sentences.cn: 这对冰雪工程人员来说是个百思不得其解的问题.

sentences.en: She presented an intriguing combination of feminine looks with a masculine mind.
sentences.cn: 人们在她身上看到了女子的容貌、男子的志气.

sentences.en: Some of the ideas are very intriguing and sound intuitively plausible.
sentences.cn: 有些想法非常吸引人，听起来觉得很有道理。
有些传说包括了使人迷惑的细节.

sentences.en: The interplay between these elements is intriguing.
sentences.cn: 这些要素的交互作用引人入胜。

sentences.en: The magazine carries an intriguing mixture of high fashion, gossip and racing.
sentences.cn: 这本杂志内容丰富有趣，有关时尚、花边新闻和赛马的内容都有。
这种提议是有迷惑力的.

sentences.en: The scientists cannot explain the intriguing grooves.
sentences.cn: 科学家们还不能解释那些令人不解的沟槽.

sentences.en: The Y chromosome is starting to yield other intriguing tales as well.
sentences.cn: Y染色体开始讲出另一些令人神往的故事.
这些发现带来了非常有趣的问题。

sentences.en: They were already intriguing to put De Guallo into North Africa.
sentences.cn: 他们已经在玩弄手法,要把戴高乐送到北非去.

sentences.en: This intriguing book is both thoughtful and informative.
sentences.cn: 这本引人入胜的书既有思想性又富知识性。

sentences.en: This is an ambitious and intriguing movie, full of striking imagery.
sentences.cn: 这是一部气势恢宏、引人入胜的电影，充满了动人心魄的瑰丽意象。

words.tran_cn: 阴谋；诡计；复杂的事；私通
[法] 密谋者，阴谋者；私通者
用诡计取得；激起...的兴趣
引起…的兴趣；策划阴谋；私通（intrigue的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: something that is intriguing is very interesting because it is strange, mysterious, or unexpected

trans.tran_cn: 搞阴谋诡计(intrigue的现在分词)，激起…的好奇心
